attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petitioner is requesting that the P.M. allows a group of Sino - Christian nuns, for the first time to use the Downing Street IT facilities to build thier school as follows ...

"Situated by Lumbini, the birthplace of Buddha, the following Nepalese school is appealling to you for your help - we are setting a small library and village school, to teach English in the jungle, on the border between India and the Himalaya kingdom.

If you have any educational texts, books or comics that you wish to get rid of, you can send them to :

Sister Consilia
Bamunigam HC
Khandamal De
Orissa
India
762021
 
What we really need is a computer for the deaf chidlren.

(they really do have nothing, P.M.)

thanks.
